org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api

Class IssueQuickSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api.IssueQuickSearch

  • public final class IssueQuickSearch
extends Object
    Provides a UI Component to pick issues.

    The component given by getComponent() contains:

    • a combo box containing all known repositories.
    • a button to create a new repository
    • a field to type some text into - to find Issues either by id or summary.

    Since:
    1.85

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  IssueQuickSearch.RepositoryFilter
      Determines what kind of repositories should be shown in the repositories combo box.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static IssueQuickSearch create()
        Creates an IssueQuickSearch providing all repositories and none of them preselected.
        Returns:
        a new IssueQuickSearch instance
        Since:
        1.85

      • create

        public static IssueQuickSearch create(FileObject context)
        Creates an IssueQuickSearch providing all repositories, where one might be preselected determined by the given file - e.g. a file from the same VCS repository was used to pick an Issue in some previous session.
        Parameters:
        context - a file to give a hint about a repository to preselect
        Returns:
        a new IssueQuickSearch instance
        Since:
        1.85

      • create

        public static IssueQuickSearch create(FileObject context,
                                      IssueQuickSearch.RepositoryFilter filter)
        Creates an IssueQuickSearch providing a filtered list of repositories, where one might be preselected determined by the given file - e.g. a file from the same VCS repository was used to pick an Issue in some previous session.
        Parameters:
        context - a file to give a hint about a repository to preselect
        filter - what kind of repositories should be provided
        Returns:
        a new IssueQuickSearch instance
        Since:
        1.85

      • selectIssue

        public static Issue selectIssue(String message,
                                Repository repository,
                                JPanel caller,
                                HelpCtx helpCtx)
        Opens a modal dialog to search after Issues from the given repository. The dialog presents a field to type some text into - to find Issues either by id or summary.
        Parameters:
        message - a message to displayed together with the combo box - e.g. Select task that this task depends on.
        repository - the repository from which is the Issue to be found
        caller - caller component
        helpCtx - a help context or null if none
        Returns:
        an Issue instance or null if none was selected.
        Since:
        1.85

        Sets the repository for which issues should be made available in the issue combo bar.
